item.description:
Let's don our tweeds, mount our steeds, and parade majestically about our fair city, ending with a group picture in Deering Oaks Park.

Participants who are willing and able can conclude with a quaff or two at Novare Res Biercafe, where we will no doubt discuss all manner of topics, including how to ride all winter, per the annual tradition of this Meetup. That discussion will probably start around 3:00. If you ride all winter, please bring show and tell items -- clothing, lights, etc. If you don't, come and be inspired!

You are welcome to attend either the ride or the discussion alone, if you can't do both!

Dress warmly!!
item.name: Tweed Ride 2012 / How to Ride All Winter
